text: @rweingarten @Alyssa_Milano You mean, like All of the Protesters taking to the STREETS didn’t cause it to spike?!  @realDonaldTrump holding his Rally won’t make a damn bit of difference to protect people from the coronavirus so STOP pretending that it will.
